DOC.criteria: Male female subject age 18 55 year , inclusive Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 2730 kg/m2 , inclusive , hypertension , control ( < 140 / < 90 ) either diet medication . BMI 3040 kg/m2 , inclusive . An informed consent document sign date subject legally acceptable representative . Subjects willing able comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , study procedure . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular ( hypertension control ( < 140 / < 90 ) either diet medication acceptable ) , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic , ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) , muscle disease , diabetes , severe uncontrolled hypertension . Known hypersensitivity phentermine , lidocaine , bupivicaine medication component study procedure . Presence cardiac pacemaker , implanted cardiac defibrillator , brain aneurysm clip . Any significant bleeding diathesis could preclude recovery biopsy procedure . ASA , ibuprofen , oral anti platelet agent discontinue least 7 day prior procedure . Abnormal CK per site laboratory range . Subjects either medical history physical evidence keloid scar formation upon physical examination . 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) demonstrate clinically significant abnormality . Pregnant nursing female females less 6 month postpartum schedule date collection . Participation nonroutine rigorous exercise ( e.g. , road race , heavy lifting , etc . ) within one week prior muscle biopsy procedure . Presence condition investigator 's opinion may negatively affect subject safety protocol adherence . Females childbearing potential ( female except tubal ligation , hysterectomy , absence menses > 2years ) unwilling use approve method contraception ( condom , diaphragm , implantable uterine device ( IUD ) release hormone ) .
